name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a skilled Senior Python Engineer with 8+ years in software development, I excel in building high-performance applications using **Python**, **Django**, and **Django REST Framework**. My expertise encompasses designing and developing **RESTful APIs** and leveraging **gRPC** for efficient communications, ensuring system responsiveness and scalability. I am proficient in orchestration using **Kubernetes** and messaging with **Kafka**, as well as deploying applications on **AWS** services including **S3**, **RDS**, **EC2**, **ECS**, and **EKS**. I utilize tools like **Celery**, **RabbitMQ**, **Datadog**, and **Prometheus** to enhance application performance and monitoring. Additionally, I have experience with data analysis tools like **ClickHouse** and **Redshift**, and guarantee optimal database performance using **PostgreSQL** and **Redis**. My solid foundation allows me to create and implement robust software solutions aligning with business objectives in various sectors, including e-commerce and healthcare.
